import React, { PureComponent } from 'react'; import { ScatterChart, Scatter, XAxis, YAxis, ZAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend } from 'recharts'; const data01 = [ { hour: '12a', index: 1, value: 0 }, { hour: '1a', index: 1, value: 180 }, { hour: '2a', index: 1, value: 150 }, { hour: '3a', index: 1, value: 120 }, ]; const data02 = [ { hour: '12a', index: 1, value: 160 }, { hour: '1a', index: 1, value: 180 }, { hour: '2a', index: 1, value: 150 }, { hour: '3a', index: 1, value: 120 }, ]; const parseDomain = () => { return [ 0, Math.max.apply(null, [ ...data01.map(entry => entry.value), ...data02.map(entry => entry.value) ]) ]; }; export default class Objet extends PureComponent { static jsfiddleUrl = 'https://jsfiddle.net/9kvhed7a/892/'; render() { const domain = parseDomain(); const range = [16, 225]; return (
); } }
